content.text: I just graduated college with my bachelors degree in education.  How about you?
I have a bachelors degree in marketing.  I'm hoping to find someone to marry me.  What are your interests?
I enjoy taking care of animals and using my nice office supplies.  I also love fishing.  What about you?
I am an avid fisherman.  I also enjoy camping and hiking.  What are your hobbies?
I enjoy writing short stories and poems.  I also like to go to the movies and play video games.
That sounds like a lot of fun.  I wish I could write.  I'm terrible at it.
You should try it.  It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to express yourself.
Maybe I will.  I have a lot of time on my hands right now.
Well, I'm glad we got to talk.  I'm sure we'll talk again sometime.
Me too.  It was nice talking to you.
